name: Delicious Prawn Dumplings
description:
Delicious Prawn Dumplings is a fun-filled food making game.
Hello girls!Mary is a little girl just like you and she loves to cook! Today she is making some special dumplings for her friends because they are having a play date and these delicious pork and prawn dumplings will be great for their tea party.Make full use of you smart cooking skills to help Mary cook the best pork and prawn dumplings ever! Have fun!

Features:
- Making processes of Delicious Prawn Dumplings in details
- Sets of cookwares, enjoy Delicious Prawn Dumplings
- Simple operations, easy to play, addictive Delicious Prawn Dumplings
- Delicious Prawn Dumplings , improve your cooking fun
- Fluent flash, fresh drawing, have fun in Delicious Prawn Dumplings
